messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Warning unidentified bloby mass detected in maintence area please send someone to inspect maint.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: may we remind you the shuttle can't leave until the blob threat is taken care of

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: oh noes, saucy blob is being bad boi, we are going to send some hard core dudes over there

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Blob at evac, and AI isss carded. Honk

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Biohazard has reached critical mass. Station loss is imminent.
